CustomField.formula: IF(RecordType.DeveloperName = "Scale", ( MGA_Commission_Adjusted__c + Policy_Fee__c) , ( Commission_Adjusted__c + FS_Fees__c + Program_Fee__c))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: FS = Commission Adjusted + FS Fees + Program Fees Scale = MGA Commission Adjusted + Underwriting Fees
CustomField.label: Total Revenue Adjusted
